text: Himesh Reshammiya is an Indian singer and Bollywood film composer. His first movie as an actor was in Aap Kaa Surroor which was released in 2007. Himesh started his career as a music director in the film Pyaar Kiya To Darna Kya in 1998. ==Early life== Before completely starting his career as a film composer, he was a television producer where he used to produce popular Daily Soaps, such as: Andaz, Ahha, Aman, Aashiqui, Amar Prem and Jaan for Zee TV. ==Filmography== ===As an Actor=== Denotes films that have not yet been released Year Film(s) Role Notes 2020 Happy Hardy and Heer Harpreet Singh Lamba aka Happy and Harshvardhan Bhatt aka Hardy 2016 Teraa Surroor Raghuu, a gangster and Tara's boyfriend 2014 The Xposé Ravi Kumar 2013 A New Love Ishtory Sikander Verma / Sukku Bhai Released on television 2012 Khiladi 786 Mansukh Desai * Nominated – Stardust Award for Breakthrough Performance – Male 2011 Damadamm!
